ygData.subject: RE: Dragon stuff from Digest Number 628
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - maybe soon some of the secrets will be shared.  Lots and lots are gonna be seeing dragons - cus they are old enough and their guilds are big
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - maybe soon some of the "secrets" will be shared. Lots and lots are
gonna be seeing dragons - cus they are "old enough" and their guilds are
"big enough" or they make alliances. The first power guild on Innoruuk -
early Talquinn who are now Legions of Darkness (LoD - Elyana's guild) don't
share secrets. My new guild The Pantheon has developed some methods of
their own and are now able to muster raiding parties in short order. Our
New Year's Eve run was the 3rd nite we went in and successfully cleared
everything to the lair even though we were missing some key members of our
team and had guests along. (Oh yeah - we have 3 of the 5 Skarlon swords
taken on our server ;p)

The times they are a'changin'... I am damn glad to be there and to get the
chance to see this stuff before it's "/shout Level 50 Bard looking for a
dragon party - will play mana song in combat!"

FYI - I did not notice trouble with lag - both my songs played just fine.
Perhaps there is more trouble when you melee and try to weave two songs. My
tanks were not feared one time nor was I. Perhaps next time, when the
dragon is well under half health, I will melee some - but in the beginning I
prefer to defer any risk to my group. If they lose me to an angry dragon,
they lose a huge amount of MR. My death hurts the whole group. I worry
more about them all staying in song range so that they don't lose my buffs
so I move around to keep them in range.

Also, speaking of lag, one time I was weaving mana song and heal song: mana
pulse, heal pulse, mana pulse, heal pulse. An enchanter in the group said
he was not getting the mana effect because he was lagged. Has this happened
to anyone or is he just giving the standard caster line: 'play mana song and
nothing else?' Now I play mana, mana, mana, then heal til I get the icon,
then mana til my icon drops, then heal til I get icon then back to mana. Is
it possible that a bard can weave songs faster than his party can get the
effects?

And finally, I think people are turning off the spam including the bard
spam. And so I get "Sylly, play mana song" a lot. And I smile sweetly and
say "Already am!" And then quick start the song in case I forgot to switch
after combat ;p Maybe its just me but I am a lot less sensitive to these
'friendly reminders' now. I sure wish that song had an icon - hehe.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bard of the 40th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Peter Hollmer [mailto:phollmer@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 5:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 628

I really wish Elyana still subscribed to this list.
She was doing both dragons, weekly, at lvl 42 - and
they never failed. I'm not disagreeing, or arguing,
and I can't say anything (I'm too young, myself), but
I'd like to hear what people that have done it did,
and what they have to say about it. I only know
(personally) 2 bards that have done dragons, and won.


Double Entendre
